## Default stair plot


```{r}
library(plotly)
library(ggplot2)

d=data.frame(x=c(1,2,4,5,7,8,9), y=c(1,2,3,5,6,7,9))
p <- ggplot() +
      geom_step(data=d, mapping=aes(x=x, y=y)) +
      geom_step(data=d, mapping=aes(x=x, y=y), direction="vh", linetype=3) +
      geom_point(data=d, mapping=aes(x=x, y=y), color="red") 

ggplotly(p)
```
